ValidationRule.description: 36545119 - limit selection of the two MMS-ASO Pilot values only to those in the MMS-ASO Pilot.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Promotion__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Promotion__c, 'ASO 2 Months Free'), ISPICKVAL(Promotion__c, 'ASO NPR 2 Months Free') ), OR( $RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity (DSA) Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity Record Type'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')), $Permission.MMS_ASO_Pilot = False )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Promotion is only available for MMS ASO Pilot Users. Please select a different Promotion
